Function Documentation

DWORD CreateBioRadio ( BOOL  useBaseStation )

Allocate memory for a BioRadio device object.

Parameters:
useBaseStationIndicates communication hardware being used. Set to true if connecting through a legacy Computer Unit. Set to false if connecting through USB Receiver.
Returns:
device object handle
int DestroyBioRadio ( DWORD  BioRadio150 )

Destroy the allocated BioRadio device object.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
Returns:
success (1) or no device object at handle (-1)
